import React from "react"; import "./Cell.css"; /** A single cell on the board. * * This has no state --- just two props: * * - flipCellsAroundMe: a function rec'd from the board which flips this * cell and the cells around of it * * - isLit: boolean, is this cell lit? * * This handles clicks --- by calling flipCellsAroundMe * **/ function Cell({ flipCellsAroundMe, isLit }) { const classes = `Cell ${isLit ? "Cell-lit" : ""}`; // return ; return ( <>
